ja485:1.2: lohitamaddane … pāṇā → lohitamadena majjāmi; vijahāmi jīvitaṃ pāṇā (si, pts-vp-pli1ed); lohitamaddane; ajjāpi vijahāmi jīvitaṃ pāṇā (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja485:2.1: Osīdi → osadhi (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1); osaṭṭhi (mr); osati (abhinavaṭīkā); osīdati (?) | dukkhaṃ → dukkhaṃ me (bj, pts-vp-pli1)
ja485:4.1: Vassamiva sare pāde → vassaṃva sare pāde (bj); vassaṃva sare pabbatapāde (pts-vp-pli1)
ja485:5.1: Pāpo khosi → pāposi kho (bj); pāpo kho (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
ja485:8.4: mayha kāmā hi → mayhaṃ kāmāhi (sya1ed, sya2ed); mayhaṃ kāmā (mr)
ja485:13.2: Tā ca giriguhāyo tatheva tiṭṭhanti → tā ca giriguhāyo (si, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja485:25.1: Vande te → te pāde (bj, sya2ed) | ayirabrahme → ayyire brahme (mr)
